website_summaries.verdict: If you need an extra layer of durability, the Griffin Survivor cases protect well against small drops and minor spills, but those who need a rugged case which can take more of a beating should look elsewhere.
pros: The Griffin Survivor case is available for select Apple, Amazon, and Samsung tablets
It ships with a sturdy removable stand and provides a healthy amount of padding to protect from drops
cons: The back and front panels are susceptible to scratches, the plastic screen protector makes displays hard to see in bright environments, and the clear silicon wrap discolors quickly

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: Somewhere along the way, my volume buttons on my iPad got moved so they don't align with this case. Squeezing the corner of the case makes the volume go up and, worst of all, the protective screen rises up off the actual screen which requires you to stand on a finger to press an icon or hit the screen hard enough to be heard at a distance. In sum, what is this?
customer_reviews.author: William T. Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Solid case ! Pop-out stand not v/g.
customer_reviews.text: 8/23/2020: Very happy with this case ! Has rigid plastic frame surrounded by silicone sleeve. Looks sharp and feels very well protected. Unfortunately, I was not as impressed with the pop-out stand feature. The angle isn’t quite right, and pushes over easily when touch-typing. I mostly use my iPad Air on a swing-away arm next to a comfy chair, so the stand isn’t a feature that matters much to me. Overall, great product at a fair price !
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Suspected counterfeit item.
customer_reviews.text: If you dig around the reviews you'll find other instances of folks receiving apparent counterfeits of this item. I ignored the warning signs (unknown supplier, ridiculously cheap) and received a case that wouldn't snap together. I ordered another direct from Griffin (found a 16 buck coupon online and free shipping) and indeed there are differences to the quality of materials, moulded graphics and fit - the real Griffin is as tight as a drum and fit for purpose - in my case hunting. Hopefully Amazon are chasing down these shady suppliers. My first ever experience of something like this shopping with them.
customer_reviews.author: RegCon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason I only buy Otterbox for my valuable electronic devices, it works well. The only problem I have is that the flaps for the Aux and charging chords broke after a year of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shayfer

customer_reviews.title: SHIPPED FROM GRIFFIN TECHNOLOGY
customer_reviews.text: GRIFFIN DIDN'T INCLUDE THE STAND IN MY SHIPMENT. WE BOUGHT THE IPHONE CASE FOR HUBBY'S IPHONE 4S. GREAT IPHONE CASE. WE JUST BOUGHT THE AIR AND A 5S. I AGREE WITH THE OTHER REVIEWER, GRIFFIN COULD HAVE DONE BETTER. HONESTLY I AM SO DISAPPOINTED. I DON'T FEEL MY AIR IS AT ALL PROTECTED AS IT SHOULD BE WITH A SURVIVOR PRODUCT. THE IPHONE CASE SILICONE/RUBBER IS DIFFERENT TEXTURE, AND IT IS NOT AS SUBSTANTIAL. ANYONE WHO HAS NOT SEEN THESE PRODUCTS IN A STORE AND WELL EXAMINED THEM, FRONT AND BACK BOTH, I WOULD SUGGEST YOU WELL COMPARE THEM TO OTHER OPTIONS FOR THE MONEY. SORRY GRIFFIN, BUT YOU GOOFED ON THIS AND THE IPHONE 5S CASE.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding case. I would not try another after having this case.
customer_reviews.text: Great choice. I would not even think about a different case after buying this make. I managed to break the kickstand early on, but that's to be expected when you drop your iPad raf too often. This case has saved my iPad several times including one hard impact on the corner. The plastic even punched through the rubber leaving about a 1/4" cut in the rubber. Surprisingly, despite my best efforts, this case has managed to keep my iPad alive and well. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Basey

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit! I ordered 6 of these because they were so much cheaper than the ones I could get through our cell phone company (starts with a 'V'). When I received them I discovered they are cheap knock offs. The build quality is extremely poor, the rubber surround is not as thick. The screen surround is a joke. I do not recommend buying these until Amazon gets this counterfeit problem under control. I'll stick to paying almost twice as much for the real thing from our cell phone company.
customer_reviews.author: Setesh

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This ipad cover is great. It is durable and provides the protection i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Darwin Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and take away the display quality
customer_reviews.text: Added a lot of thickness to the iPad . Very heavy. I realize you need the weight and thickness to give good protection so it's not really the survivor designer fault. The screen is covered with a plastic protector sheet which reduce the sensitivity of the touch! You have to press harder. It also deceived the purpose of retina display. Would not recommend unless you plan to drop your ipad, go climbing with your ipad, ....etc
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Should be a required purchase for houses with small children
customer_reviews.text: I was really apprehensive about having a tablet in our house given that the resident two year old destroys most nice things he comes in contact with. The case was a little difficult to get on the iPad but not impossible. I actually kinda like that it's hard to put on because it gives me some sort of weird satisfaction that yes, the iPad is properly protected. I nearly purchased this at Target along with the iPad but decided to check out the price on Amazon first. I'm glad I did because I saved about 50% off the retail price.
customer_reviews.author: amhcdb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It has served me well for over a year, and still shows no sign of wear. My iPad Air definitely feels safe and sturdy. I've dropped my tablet a few times, and the machine shows no sign of abuse or wear and tear. I highly recommend this brand of case for any phone or tablet. It should be noted that this case is not waterproof, so don't use this casing if you plan on taking your tablet/phone for a swim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Cool case fits the iPad Air 2 perfectly. The biggest drawback in that plastic covers the camera lens and makes all pics blurry
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The case actually works very well with the iPad Air as far as protection is concerned. My one ding I would have to say is the cover for the camera. Unless you have a good set of fingernails it is a little problematic to open up. It is very sand proof though so I guess it's a trade off. I would very much recommended for soldiers who are deploying.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Charles Hicks

customer_reviews.title: This case is nice love how it feels but my old thing about ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is nice love how it feels but my old thing about it the case let's dirt and things get under the screen protector so not a big fan of that but overall good.
customer_reviews.author: hershey

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! Got tired of holding my IPAD all the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Got tired of holding my IPAD all the time when I was watching a show. Now I can just prop it up and let her go. Sturdy stand and the rubber case makes me feel a lot more comfortable about the IPads safety. Folds flat and is super easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell ryan

customer_reviews.title: it was very good.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was for iPad air, i needed it for an iPad pro. Still no big deal because we have an iPad air, but it doesn't fit that either. I know that sending it back isn't worth, because I lose money. I have no complains about your service, it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: lvittum

customer_reviews.title: marked as new, but i was sent a used item
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 13, first one i opened appears to be used. screen protector is definitely scratched up, i will update review more as i hear back from the people who use the other 12. unfortunately for me i need them right away so i can't return them to seller the one i opened does however appear to be a genuine survivor case.
customer_reviews.author: Pat H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: After having my then 5 year old drop my iPad on the hard garage floor & cracking the screen, I decided to invest on some protection. I've since already dropped my iPad a few times w/ no issues at all. We've been impressed with the Griffin Survivor that we eventually purchased one for my wife's mini-iPad.
customer_reviews.author: MTB.fantoman

customer_reviews.title: i use this on my iPad as a pilot. ...
customer_reviews.text: i use this on my iPad as a pilot. Ive dropped it from 30,000 feet out the window of the plane. Someone in the midwest found it. They found my address on the back and mailed it back to me. The iPad was still running. What a case.
customer_reviews.author: Keni Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great protection at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great protective case. My autistic son has thrown his iPad many times and it still works perfectly. This case has done its job well, and it's half the price of the Otterbox. I only wish the stand was better. It didn't take my son very long to break that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great case, poor stand.
customer_reviews.text: Rubber feet on stand broke on first use. Plastic foot (under where the rubber feet were) broke off within 3 months. I am very happy with the case itself, but I have purchased another stand to replace the poorly manufactured one that came with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great case at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and had decided on the Griffin Survivor for my IPad Air. The big box stores had it for around $80. When I discovered it on Amazon at half the price I ordered immediately. Even with the $9 shipping it was still a bargain. The instructions are a little difficult to understand, but you can always watch the video on You-Tube. Very happy with this product and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great overall protection for the Ipad Air specially when children around, i would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Alexv77084

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy duty case
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze and was pretty much the same as putting on an Otterbox for an iPhone. The case snapped easily into place on my iPad air and the rubber shock guard slid on easily as well. The only thing I dislike is that it is difficult to clean the built in screen protector with a microfiber cloth and the touch capacitance is reduced by the screen protector. However, this is a small price to pay for a well protected iPad. I shattered the glass on my prior iPad twice because I did not have an adequate case.
customer_reviews.author: MojoJoeJoe

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting air bubbles and have to open it and reset to get bubbles out. Opening the case is difficult and closing it is difficult. I like the rubber part of the case, but that is about it. I would shop around for a better case.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Great fit. Only potential issue is the home button design. It's a different design than older models and could cause the iPad to turn on inside a bag or backpack. Not unhappy with it, but it seems like something to watch. I had a griffin survivor case protecting my iPad 2 for 2.5 years of very hard use. Took it out of the case for the first time yesterday and it looked brand new.
customer_reviews.author: BMN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit with the iPad Air volume buttons. The "volume up" key is mashed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survivor Cases add weight and thickness, but piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two Griffin Survivor Cases for my daughter and her husband who both travel extensively. My wife then gifted be with an iPad Air. I didn't want to use it until it was in a Survivor case. It took away the charm an the lightness of the Air, but protects wonderfully. Not long after having my case on, my wife dropped her iPad 2, which was in a cute decorative case. The fall shattered her screen and bent the corner of the iPad. Should have been in a Survivor Case,
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Puro

customer_reviews.title: good protective cover
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have an iPad if it weren't for this cover. It withstands a clumsy adult as well as a distracted 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Aprildew

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Easy to grip and I don't have to worry about it sliding off whenever I lay it down. Not too bulky. I haven't used the stand yet. I bought it a lot cheaper on Amazon than it was selling for at my local store.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Best case for iPad air
customer_reviews.text: Great case! 2nd one we've purchased and never have had any issues and definitely keeps it protected.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Finger

customer_reviews.title: Great case for Ipad Air 1
customer_reviews.text: Great case for Ipad Air 1. I've had it for over a year and it has protected my iPad Air very well. However, I bought this case again for an iPad Air2 and it does fit but blocks the volume buttons on the right hand side. The case buttons aren't placed properly over the iPad and it can cause you to mute your device. To fix this issue, you'll have to completely remove it from its' case. I hope Griffin redesigns this case for the iPad Air 2.
customer_reviews.author: shahmaan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart after 2 years. Stand broke after 2 weeks. But still in use
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Northrup

customer_reviews.title: FAKE AND BUILT poorly.
customer_reviews.text: THIS is a fake griffen product. it is very poorly made. I have used for 2 days and the part where the headphones plug in is about to rip off.
customer_reviews.author: brandon pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Been using this same style of case ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Been using this same style of case for all my devices and I've never had one break or come apart.
customer_reviews.author: crazy_one

customer_reviews.title: product quality disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I was very disappointed. The shopping experience and delivery were exceptional,but the product quality was not what I expected. The screen cover is too easily damaged (scratched and hazy) during assembly. And the instructions were inside the case, requiring the user to figure out how to take it apart to get the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very tough
customer_reviews.text: My son has put this through several stress tests, and my iPad is still working. This thing has been thrown, kicked, jumped on, etc. but the iPad is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ender

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I love griffin cases it is the only brand that I use on my apple devices an iPod touch iPhone 4 iPhone 5 and an iPad air. The durability is really good and protects my devices even from drops from about 6 feet in the air. The only thing I don't like about it is the stand it's pretty rickety and tabs on the sides make it harder to pull out. If it had a better stand this would be the perfect case to protect your iPad.
customer_reviews.author: BNOS648

customer_reviews.title: Seller was good but.  Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: This review is mostly geared towards manufacturer, the quality was poor. Only slight gripe with seller is the box was in poor shape.. What a waste of $.. The so called screen protector had light scratches all over it and the film had a "smokey" hue to it...Made my thousand dollar ipad look like crap. I actually tossed it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Would like it more if the stand could be used in landscape and portrait positions. Also it would be great if it had a cover over the plastic screen cover.
customer_reviews.author: luisjms

customer_reviews.title: tough case!
customer_reviews.text: Best Ipad case ever,went thru many before this one,have same type on my Iphone and dropped it countless times and phone is intact,water resistant but not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! I would never buy anything else for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I would never buy anything else for my I pad Air. After 4 cases. This is the best. Great feel, Great protection. And doesn't really add that much bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Irv Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great protection.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Survivor Case(2 IPad and 2 cell phone). These are one of the best cases that I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Loyed Ezzell

customer_reviews.title: So far
customer_reviews.text: So far everything is fine. I really love it like I figured I would. I don't plan on letting it drop of course and I don't want it near water so I really don't care to review on the resistance properties it suppose to have. Although I DID get it as a child-proof case so that my little boy doesn't mess it up if he tries to chew on it or has wet fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Anita C. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: dust gets inside and is not easy to open and clean it has lasted so far ...
customer_reviews.text: dust gets inside and is not easy to open and clean it has lasted so far but looking for a better alternative
customer_reviews.author: noepaty

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have these cases for all my devices and love 'em. Great dust/dirt protection and fall protection.

customer_reviews.title: One improvement suggestion.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. One improvement could be a different design for the stand allowing multiple angles. Current stand does not allow the iPad to lean back enough to be of much use.
customer_reviews.author: BER

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case, my kids have stolen my iPad and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case, my kids have stolen my iPad and dropped it a few times, this case is a life saver, the ipad is still in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Logic Rox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Easel stand is difficult to open and eventually broke. Small rubber feet on easel fell off and were easily lost. Returned it for a refund. Just not what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Babineaux

customer_reviews.title: very good product and very good company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: very good protection for iPad. The case lets me take the iPad wherever I want without having to worry about dropping it. Also, if you have any problems, it is very easy to contact the company directly, and they are very willing to help. One small issue is that it is sometimes hard to get the touch screen to work in the far corners of the plastic cover that covers the iPad screen; you sometimes have to press quite hard.
customer_reviews.author: ilanger

customer_reviews.title: best lifesaver ever
customer_reviews.text: It came right on time and it has done wonders... my sister has dropped it a few times and it has saved her ipad's life!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, Price is good
customer_reviews.text: It protects my iPad and was fairly good price, but within the first week the stand broke and got lost at the same time. Of course, Griffin does not sale the stands separately. Grrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Little Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great, rugged case that doesn't cost an arm and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, rugged case that doesn't cost an arm and a leg. It can be annoying to constantly open the camera flaps, but if you need them you have them, if you don't, cut them off.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Auxt

customer_reviews.title: Grat Case
customer_reviews.text: I Love this case, and I love the seller I recommend both this case is sturdy and it does not the ipad air to bulky

customer_reviews.title: Very protective to the iPad itself. No protection to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very protective to the iPad itself. No protection to the screen area. Very difficult to put on and remove from the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Worth every cent, I love this unit, it is all that is advertised! Highly recommended for those on the go!!! Great protection all around.
customer_reviews.author: Tad D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: a little big but I wanted strong more than I did appearance. so far I have No trouble with this case and I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: For the pilots, it also fits in a Ram Mount. This can also be applied to road travel for the non-pilots.
customer_reviews.author: Twigg

customer_reviews.title: Not new as stated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present because I have one and love it. I was disappoint in that I do not believe this was new as stated. When my daughter opened it had scratch all over it and spots. It was not in package like the one a got at Best Buy new.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Small

customer_reviews.title: Tested and Approved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a daycare and was put to the test immediately. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KGeisler

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, it protects very securely and is very easy to use. Great piece of mind and great case.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Krigbaum

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good investment.
customer_reviews.text: This case added some weight to the Ipad, but I feel it will keep it safe from damage. Overall a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPad Air perfectly.. I haven't dropped it, but seems to be very tough. I definitely recommend it for the average user.
customer_reviews.author: KCG

customer_reviews.title: ... but the inside of the clear plastic scratches very easy. I tried to dust it with a microfiber ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems really tough but the inside of the clear plastic scratches very easy. I tried to dust it with a microfiber cloth and it came away with scratches all over.
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: Like this cover
customer_reviews.text: Good value to iPad air as we did not want to spend to get another Otterbox. Durable and so far so good for our 7 year old to schelp around.
customer_reviews.author: slou

customer_reviews.title: Good strong case.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy little case that seems to "grow" fingerprints and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: J. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Only good thing about this is that it protects really well
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good Protection Cons: heavy, fingerprints cover the screen. Bright glare pretty much makes the screen a mirror. Expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Imran Khan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall its has met my expectations. The only issue I have is the attached easle back that causes the pad to stand up is cheap plastic and has popped a pin out twice when I have tried to use it. You have to to be gentle when pulling the legs out to stand the pad up. That seems a little odd considering it is marketed as "being used by the military because of the rugged protection it gives".
customer_reviews.author: Larry Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This case has exceeded my expectations and performed exactly as I wanted. It feels good to hold in your hands, and I love the way that the tacky rubber allows it to sit securely on slick surfaces. My only minor complaint is that the screen is difficult to keep from smudging, but it's minor. You just wipe it off every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Knock off. Counterfit.
customer_reviews.text: READ ALL THE 1 STAR Ratings. The case is a knock off. Nothing lines up. The buttons on the case dont match the buttons on the iPad. I cant believe Amazon still aloows the product of their site after all the bad ratings.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an excellent case and at half the price of retailers near me. I do wish it could be lighter in weight
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Davis

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend this case. I use it for automotive work and keeps ipad clean from grease, oil, dirt, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio

customer_reviews.title: product worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it as much as you can like a cover for an Ipad
customer_reviews.author: Kari Herslip

customer_reviews.title: Great case!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Case is great!!!! Kick stand is a little loose but works well on both angles. Your iPad is completely sealed. Plastic covers all the way past the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Protection is good, but the case turns on the iPad when ...
customer_reviews.text: Protection is good, but the case turns on the iPad when I put it in my backpack. It got so frustrating that I ended up buying the lifeproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Engebretson

customer_reviews.title: I love the durability of this case
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability of this case. The stand is nice when I need to use my online recipe site to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: protect ion is great, same one at Sams was 50.00
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy duty. I can take it anywhere & do not have to worry about something happening to my Ipad. I traveled with it in a carryon on an airplane. I found it easy to access it. Also, I have a young grandson who likes to play on it & do not have to worry about him breaking it. It seems to be indestructible with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sherman

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Can stand the test of time. Extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 kids under 9 and they drop my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids under 9 and they drop my ipad and abuse it and this thing continues to protect.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot so far i have had ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot so far i have had it for 5 months now and its great no damages to my ipad the screen is clear for me just onyl problem is that teh volume even when its high i cant hear it clear that is the main issue i had with it but other than that it really keeps my ipad air clean.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for Protection but the Stand is too small and you can't type while standing it up.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any busy family
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy - even for my teenagers that take the iPad everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: M Keller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I does what it says I dropped my iPad once and I and I'm glad I had it protected or I would be very unhappy right now
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This item is poorly built and in fact not a real Griffin product. The one I received was confirmed counterfeit by Griffin. I will be ordering directly from the manufacturer for this item instead and sending this one back.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This case is durable, functional and I'm glad I bought it! I highly recommend this as opposed to its expensive competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty case. I am a teacher at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty case. I am a teacher at a school ant the cases seem to hold up well with students using them.
customer_reviews.author: Dalene Bricker

customer_reviews.title: Price reflects quality
customer_reviews.text: Not really good quality. Of course, it was cheap, so the price reflects the quality. The main problem is the screen cover, mainly around the on button. The film is starting to come off already. Water can get underneath because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Raylie

customer_reviews.title: My iPad survive being drop more than a dozen times ...
customer_reviews.text: My iPad survive being dropped more than a dozen times, until my bull terrier decided to give it a little test.
customer_reviews.author: Pixeltheraphy

customer_reviews.title: and the screen protector always gets dirty and scratchs
customer_reviews.text: The case is not as durable as it seems. The stand support is already broken, and the screen protector always gets dirty and scratchs.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Poggioli

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!! the case i received through the mail was FAKE!!
customer_reviews.text: i give this cheap knock off 1 stare because i can not give 0, the case i received was fake and has all dedicates of a knock off, from its cheap rubber that will be torn easily to the non fitting from face plate which will never keep its hold because its made horribly, i looked up all the indications of a Counterfeit Griffin Survivor case and this genuine piece of crap shows all the signs.. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUT STRAIGHT FROM GRIFFIN! I just hope Amazon will send me a Real Replacement
customer_reviews.author: Global Storage

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: This may be in a retail box but the screen is scratched all over, the instructions for taking it apart are inside the case and there is a tear in the screen protector. Do NOT buy this product or from this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Katy S.

customer_reviews.title: Recieved wrong case
customer_reviews.text: First off, I received a case for a mini instead of an Air. So I really can't rate a case for an air. From what I can tell from the mini case, it looks like a knock off not one from Griffin
customer_reviews.author: shawn leben

customer_reviews.title: Otter box is better
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this case. Had discoloration and eventually got an otter box which we love.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas Burch III

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This case felt very cheap and flimsy. Only 4 of the 8 snap points between the front and back portions of the case come together. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Its the same product that Best Buy sell for 1/2 the price
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Its the same product that Best Buy sell for 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Compared with price, this item is very cheap and nice. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This a great way to protect your iPad. I'll never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the case works great.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is loose and wobbles unless it is in use. The rest of the case works great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MUST HAVE FOR IPAD. HOPE THEY MAKE THEM FOR IPHONE 6 PLUS
customer_reviews.author: justin blaise

product_meta.description: Designed and tested to meet or exceed US Department of Defense Standard 810F, Griffins Survivor Extreme-Duty Case is designed from the inside out to
feature_bullets: Independently tested to meet conditions outlined in US Department of Defense MIL-STD-810
Integral Display shield deflects wind and rain (Test: up to 200 mm/hr. for 1 hour)
